body:
ReduceResult MaglevGraphBuilder::BuildLoadField(
    compiler::PropertyAccessInfo const& access_info,
    ValueNode* lookup_start_object, compiler::NameRef name) { ... }

Located maglev/maglev-graph-builder.cc. Implements loading of data fields: handles double vs tagged fields, constant folding for in-object constant fields; emits LoadTaggedField/LoadFloat64 for double fields and LoadTaggedFieldForProperty for tagged fields. Records known property via RecordKnownProperty.
explanation: Central lowering for field loads in Maglev: differentiates double vs tagged field loads and is the anchor for LoadTaggedField/LoadFloat64 usage.
